Question
========
Halley's comet is in a highly elliptical orbit around the sun. Its speed

Answerlist
----------
* is constant.
* increases as it nears the sun.
* decreases as it nears the sun.
* is zero when it reaches its furthest point from the sun.

Solution
========
Orbiting objects get faster when they get closer to the sun (Kepler's second law).
